title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When appending N lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is redrawn N times unnecessarily.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Enable word wrap mode in the StyledText component.
3. Append N lines of text to the StyledText.
4. Observe the redraw behavior and notice that the entire client area is redrawn N times.
